segments.text: Oh , hi Pam . When did you get back from Canada ? How was it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The day before yesterday . I only visited Montreal and Ottawa , but I had a great time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which city did you like better ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's hard to say ... I think Ottawa is prettier.It has better sightseeing , too . A lot of museums and galleries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what's Montreal like ? What did you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Montreal is more exciting . It has better shopping.The stores are cheaper and more interesting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , Montreal of sure . It has more restaurants and clubs.They say Montreal is the most exciting city in Canada .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I've always wanted to see Vancouver . I've heard it has the most beautiful views .
segments.speaker: S1
